title: Arousal State-Based Learning Optimization: Performance Enhancement Project via Biometric Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Establishing a real-time feedback environment for collecting biometric data using wearable devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between arousal states (low/medium/high) and academic achievement using experimental data.
Learners can analyze biofeedback data to derive and apply individual optimal learning arousal levels.
Learners can implement and assess the effectiveness of at least three practical strategies (e.g., breathing techniques, activity switching) for regulating arousal states in project-based activities.

resources: Empatica E4 or Similar Biometric Wearable Devices

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
